title.rendered: 2022 World Cup in Qatar Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2022 World Cup Rates

Whether you want to attend the group stage, follow your team, or be there for the thrilling knockout matches, our 2022 World Cup travel packages are yours to personalize. Our luxury travel packages include first class accommodations, your preferred match day experiences, 24/7 service from our team of on-site hosts and destination specialists in Qatar, and a carefully selected list of extras. You let us know what your ultimate World Cup experience looks like and we’ll put together a custom itinerary that is perfect for you.

2022 World Cup Group Stage Packages

(Nov 20-27 or Nov 27-Dec 4)
HotelRoom Type7-Night Packages From
Millennium Plaza DohaStandard Room $10,775
Dusit DohaSuperior Room$11,425
Dusit DohaJunior Suite$12,745
St. Regis DohaGrand Deluxe Room$15,375
St. Regis DohaSuitesCall for Rates
Ritz-Carlton, DohaDeluxe Room$16,435
Ritz-Carlton, DohaClub Deluxe RoomCall for rates
Ritz-Carlton, DohaSuitesCall for rates
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.

2022 World Cup Finals Week Packages

(December 11-19)
HotelRoom Type8-Night Packages From
Millennium Plaza DohaStandard Room $16,850
Dusit DohaSuperior Room$18,920

Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. Rates include all local and state taxes. A 50% deposit is required to secure your package. Final balance will be due 120 days prior to travel. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
